error.unknow_station_id: WAQI API doesn't support this station ID

user.title: Choose station adding method WAQI
user.description: Choose station adding method WAQI, what you preffered: using geographic localization or using station ID

geographic_localization.title: Add WAQI station using grographic localization
geographic_localization.description: Fill your WAQI token, latitude and longitude of your station or home, and optionally custom name for service instace. You can find WAQI token here https://aqicn.org/data-platform/token/

data.token: Token key of World's Air Quality Index account
data.name: Name of service

station_id.title: Add WAQI station using ID
station_id.description: Fill your WAQI token, id of your station (without @ prefix) and optionally custom name for service instace. You can find WAQI token here https://aqicn.org/data-platform/token/

data.token: Token key of World's Air Quality Index account
data.name: Name of service
